```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(gtools)
```

```{r}
n_alleles = 3
p = rep(1/n_alleles, n_alleles)
p = c(0.9, 0.05, 0.05)

(n_genotypes = (n_alleles)*(n_alleles+1)/2)
(het_genotypes = combinations(n_alleles, 2, 1:n_alleles))
(hom_genotypes = matrix(1:n_alleles, ncol=2, nrow=n_alleles))
genotypes = rbind(het_genotypes, hom_genotypes)
(genotypes = data.frame(genotypes))
genotypes$W= rnorm(nrow(genotypes), mean=1, sd=0.05)
genotypes

 k=0
for(i in 1:n_alleles){
  for(j in 1:n_alleles){
    k=k+1
    if(i!=j & j<i){
      a=j
      b=i
    }else{
        a=i
        b=j
    }
    if (i==1 & j==1){
       W= genotypes$W[which(genotypes$X1==a &genotypes$X2==b)]
    fitness_tab= data.frame(i=i, j=j, W=W, pi=p[i],pj=p[j],  fitness_contr=p[i]*p[j]*W)
    }else{
      W= genotypes$W[which(genotypes$X1==a &genotypes$X2==b)]
    fitness1= data.frame(i=i, j=j, W=W, pi=p[i],pj=p[j],  fitness_contr=p[i]*p[j]*W)
    fitness_tab <- rbind(fitness_tab, fitness1)
    }
  }
}
fitness_tab

(mean_fitness=sum(fitness_tab$fitness_contr))
```
